title: Footed Tray from the Maria Theresa Service
medium: Soft-paste porcelain, green ground, polychrome enamels, and gilding
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of the Antiquarian Society in memory of Mrs. Edward Byron Smith, through the Mrs. Arthur S. Bowes, Mrs. DeWitt W. Buchanan, Jr., Mrs. Huntington Eldridge, Mrs. William O. Hunt, Mr. Edward Byron Smith, Mrs. Howard A. Stotler, Mrs. John W. Taylor III, Mrs. Frank E. Voysey, and Mrs. Burke Williamson Funds
